data.title: Localizacion Casa rural los moruchos
data.text:
Our cottage is located in Castilla y Leon, , in a village called Aldearrubia Salamanca se encuentra in the C/ Traviesa n° 9, . It is 14 kms away from Salamanca.

Arriving by car is very easy:

If you come from Madrid or its surroundings, while you are in the A-50 take exit 83 towards Encinas de Abajo, then follow the road DSA-640 until you reach Aldearrubia

If you come from Salamanca, use the Aldealengua road (SA-804) ) until you reach the turnoff to Aldearrubia.

And if you prefer to travel by air, the house is located only 11.9 km away from the MatacÃ¡n Airport (Machachón).

In order to help you, we will show you where it is in a map:

Finally we indicate the coordinates: Latitude 41.007957 degrees, longitude -5.50061.
